nodes.text: Star Wars Manga: Return of the Jedi 2

Star Wars Manga: Return of the Jedi 2 is the second volume in the Return of the Jedi manga series. It was illustrated by Shin-Ichi Hiromoto and was based upon the original story by George Lucas. It was adapted from the screenplay by George Lucas and Lawrence Kasdan. The cover art is by Adam Warren.

Jabba the Hutt attempts to throw Luke Skywalker, Han Solo and Chewbacca into the Great Pit of Carkoon. But as Luke and the gang escape Jabba's henchmen, Jabba is choked to death by Leia Organa. After escaping the Hutt, Luke goes to Yoda, who passes away before him.
